decks.notes: This Sidisi, Undead Vizier combo deck focuses on tutoring and utilizing graveyard recursion to assemble powerful combos and control the board. By utilizing cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Necromancy to bring back key creatures like Griselbrand or Necrotic Ooze, the deck aims to generate value and close out the game quickly. The deck also includes powerful disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up your own combos. With a mix of card draw, removal, and powerful combo pieces, this deck aims to efficiently set up its win conditions while maintaining control of the game through efficient resource management and powerful synergy.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control over the game by disrupting your opponent's plays while gaining incremental advantage through card draw and powerful spells. Grand Arbiter Augustin IV acts as a taxing effect on your opponent's spells, making them harder to cast, while also reducing the cost of your own spells. The deck contains a variety of counter spells, removal spells, and board wipes to control the battlefield and keep your opponent's threats at bay. Additionally, there are card draw engines like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Sphinx's Revelation to ensure you maintain card advantage throughout the game. The goal is to outvalue your opponent and secure victory through superior control of the game.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing powerful creatures and synergies to overwhelm opponents quickly. Marath, Will of the Wild serves as the commander, providing versatility and a repeatable source of damage. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures, mana ramp, and removal spells to maintain board control and pressure opponents. Cards like Swords to Plowshares, Sylvan Library, and Sunpetal Grove offer flexibility and consistency in the deck's strategy. Additionally, the deck features cards like Purphoros, God of the Forge, Primeval Titan, and Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker to create explosive plays and end the game decisively. Overall, the key concept of the deck is to apply relentless pressure and win through fast and aggressive plays.

The main idea of this deck is to ramp up quickly with mana dorks and land ramp spells to accelerate into powerful threats and disruptive elements. Yisan, the Wanderer Bard serves as the commander providing a consistent toolbox of creatures to answer different situations. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures like Craterhoof Behemoth and efficient removal like acidic slime. It also includes various utility creatures like Eternal Witness and Fauna Shaman to ensure consistency in drawing key pieces. The land base is designed to provide strong mana acceleration with cards like Gaea's Cradle and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, enabling explosive plays and dominating the mid to late game.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while steadily building up a strong presence on the battlefield. With a mix of removal spells, hand disruption, and powerful creatures, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain its advantage as the game progresses. The inclusion of versatile cards like Abrupt Decay and Vindicate allows for flexibility in dealing with various threats, while efficient creatures like Dark Confidant and Thrun, the Last Troll offer resilience and card advantage. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors and land destruction elements to keep opponents on the back foot.

This deck revolves around efficiently playing aggressive creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with counter spells and removal. With a focus on generating early board presence through mana acceleration with cards like Birds of Paradise and Noble Hierarch, then building a strong board state with creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Voice of Resurgence. The inclusion of powerful equipment like Sword of Fire and Ice and Umezawa's Jitte further enhances the deck's aggressive strategy. The deck also includes interaction cards like Swords to Plowshares and Counterspell to deal with threats from the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain control of the game through efficient creature spells and disruption.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by ramping up mana quickly and using powerful spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It utilizes a combination of counterspells, board wipes, and removal spells to keep the opponent on the back foot while generating card advantage through draw spells like Sylvan Library and Thirst for Knowledge. Maelstrom Wanderer serves as the commander to provide additional value by cascading into more spells for free. The deck also includes various versatile artifacts and planeswalkers to further control the board and outvalue the opponent. Overall, the key strategy is to establish control early, ramp up mana quickly, and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing The Mimeoplasm's ability to combine different creatures in the graveyard to create powerful threats. It includes a variety of combo pieces and control elements to protect the combo and disrupt opponents' strategies. The main goal is to fill the graveyard with key creatures like Jin-Gitaxias or Griselbrand, reanimate them with cards like Reanimate or Animate Dead, and then use The Mimeoplasm to copy their abilities. Additionally, the deck includes cards for card advantage, tutoring, and interaction to support the combo. The strategy revolves around assembling the right pieces in the graveyard and utilizing them to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful creature.
